feed.title: Improv Festivals
feed.subtitle: "Improv Festivals" is a site to list impro festivals all over the world.

entry.title: Auckland Improv Festival
entry.content: The Auckland Improv Festival is all about showcasing and developing the art of improvisation. It‚Äôs community in spirit and professional in standards. AIF is a curated festival with expert teachers providing quality workshops and offers a diverse line up of shows from around the world.

AIF is a curated festival with expert teachers providing quality workshops and offers a diverse line up of shows from around the world.

entry.title: IFO Impro Fest
entry.content: The IFO Impro Fest ist one of Germany¬¥s biggest international festival with workshop, shows, party and a lot of improv fun!

entry.title: W√ºrzburger Improtheaterfestival
entry.content: The W√ºrzburger Improtheaterfestival offers an intense weekend featuring extended workshops led by professional instructors from around the world, along with a varied show program. It has turned into a small, familiar and cosy festival with space and time for intensive work but also for real interpersonal contact.

entry.title: The REMIX Festival
entry.content:
Back for another year it‚Äôs the Reallygood Edinburgh Musical Improv eXtravaganza! Join us in Edinburgh üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å≥Û†Å£Û†Å¥Û†Åø from 18-20th October for an incredible weekend of musical improv classes and performances.

All of the workshops, shows, and jams are included in simple weekend passes so there‚Äôs no FOMO and you‚Äôll get to make loads of new improv pals.

PS. If you don‚Äôt like singing don‚Äôt worry, you can do a complete weekend of non musical improv classes with our teachers- we won‚Äôt judge you!

entry.title: Birmingham Improv Festival 2024
entry.content: Birmingham‚Äôs Brilliant Biennial Improv Festival, bringing the best shows, teachers and improv fun to the UK‚Äôs Second City.

entry.title: Das Improv Festival
entry.content:
Berlin‚Äôs long-form improv festival! Featuring the best alternative improv from across Europe and North America, with an exciting slate of headline acts from around the world and top-notch workshops and intensives, plus all the best improv Berlin itself has to offer.

Sign up for our mailing list to get notified about Das news, including shows, ticket sales, workshops & more!
entry.summary: Berlin‚Äôs long-form improv festival! Featuring the best alternative improv from across Europe and North America, with an exciting slate of headline acts from around the world and top-notch workshops and intensives, plus all the best improv Berlin itself has to offer. Sign up for our mailing list to get notified about Das news, including shows, ticket sales, workshops & more!

entry.title: Sofia Improv Fest
entry.content:
• The festival will focus on a DEEP DIVE into the realms of improv. The four original topics are:

  • ü¶© DEEP DIVE into Fun and Games: We‚Äôre on the lookout for acts that will have our audience rolling with laughter. Bring on the joy, the silliness, and the side-splitting humor!

  • üåë DEEP DIVE into Darkness: Explore the shadows and mysteries of the stage and our craft. Show us your skills in weaving tales of intrigue and suspense!

  • ü§∏ DEEP DIVE into Physicality: Move it, shake it, own the stage! We want performances that showcase the incredible power of the body in storytelling. Express yourself through the art of movement.

  • üôÇüò•Ôªøü•∞ÔªøÔªøüò†Ôªø DEEP DIVE into Emotions: Can you channel your inner actor? Whether it‚Äôs laughter, tears, or everything in between ‚Äì bring your A-game in evoking genuine feelings.

Whether it‚Äôs laughter, tears, or everything in between ‚Äì bring your A-game in evoking genuine feelings.

entry.title: MOMENTA - Impro Theater Festival International
entry.content: Top-class international guests with innovative ideas and skills in improvisation, inspiring workshops, a hand-picked festival ensemble, shows, brand new improv formats, virtuosity and happenings - all this stands for a festival of special moments: MOMENTA!
entry.summary: Top-class international guests with innovative ideas and skills in improvisation, inspiring workshops, a hand-picked festival ensemble, shows, brand new improv formats, virtuosity and happenings - all this stands for a festival of special moments: MOMENTA!

entry.title: Improvizza!
entry.content: Improvizza! is a theatrical improvisation festival held in Malta, bringing together improvisers from all over the world to take workshops, play in jams, perform in showcases, watch shows and foster an improvisation community. Taking place on a tiny island in the middle of the Mediterranean, it offers a wonderful cultural, historical and artistic experience.
entry.summary: Improvizza! is a theatrical improvisation festival held in Malta, bringing together improvisers from all over the world to take workshops, play in jams, perform in showcases, watch shows and foster an improvisation community. Taking place on a tiny island in the middle of the Mediterranean, it offers a wonderful cultural, historical and artistic experience.

entry.title: Improfestival Karlsruhe
entry.content:
After a smashing success in the last few years we are happy to be back in 2024 with even more shows and workshops.

This year we have a selection of:

  • 12 ensemble-members (10 actors, 1 musician and 1 technician)
  • A total of 9 days workshops, including one 3-day workshop with a showcase
  • And 18 completely different shows over 6 nights of performances

We are very excited to have a put together a program of very different improvised styles that are represented in unique shows and workshops but at the same time to keep the spirit of a ‚Äúcozy festival for friends‚Äù.

We are looking forward to having you back or welcoming you for a first time in Karlsruhe!

Follow us, get more info or book your tickets:

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • About the ensemble
  • Book your shows
  • Book your workshops
entry.summary: After a smashing success in the last few years we are happy to be back in 2024 with even more shows and workshops. This year we have a selection of: 12 ensemble-members (10 actors, 1 musician and 1 technician) A total of 9 days workshops, including one 3-day workshop with a showcase And 18 completely different shows over 6 nights of performances We are very excited to have a put together a program of very different improvised styles that are represented in unique shows and workshops but at the same time to keep the spirit of a ‚Äúcozy festival for friends‚Äù. We are looking forward to having you back or welcoming you for a first time in Karlsruhe!
